title: Courted by Karma
description: Courted by Karma is the second volume in the sexily romantic and seriously fun series of The Adventures of Anabel Axelrod! COURTED BY KARMA... Anabel Axelrod is back…and so is Luke Drake! First it was Her Turn. Now it is His Turn. Anabel’s life was sizzling before, but now its on fire! Can she handle the heat? After her last crazy few days, Anabel is looking for nothing but a good time during the traditional upcoming Axelrod Women Weekend. Cousin Layla and some friends are flying in from Florida for a visit. Despite Chief Jack’s warning not to call him this year if they end up in jail again, the women plan to rock the town! But first our girl has to survive some parents, some Russians, some Mexicans, Thanksgiving, and Anabel’s hottest challenge ever…Luke Drake. And Mr. Secretive has plans of his own. Will it ever be Our Turn for Luke and Anabel, or is it her karma to get burned by the smokin’ hot flames? Author’s note: For mature adults only.
author: Tracy Ellen
